name: true
title: true manual page
description: The true utility always returns with an exit code of zero.

sections.title: NAME
codeBlocks:
true – return true value
     true
     The true utility always returns with an exit code of zero.

     Some shells may provide a builtin true command which is identical to this
     utility.  Consult the builtin(1) manual page.
     builtin(1), csh(1), false(1), sh(1)
     The true utility is expected to be IEEE Std 1003.2 (“POSIX.2”)
     compatible.
